sentences.sContent: The insurer may reinsure the insurance of the subject matter enumerated in the preceding paragraph.
sentences.sContent_eng: The insurer may reinsure the insurance of the subject matter enumerated in the preceding paragraph.
sentences.sCn: 保险人可以将对前款保险标的的保险进行再保险。

trans.tranOther: to share the insurance of something between two or more companies, so that there is less risk for each
